bug.author: ghop02
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêûDescribe the bug</denchmark-h>
Coreml yields different results when using the TF2 bilinear resize op. There are a lot more details about this bug in https://machinethink.net/blog/coreml-upsampling/. I'm not 100% sure if this is an issue that can be fixed in coremltools. To my knowledge there isn't a compatible coreml op that maintains the proper behavior.
<denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Most of the reproduction is in the blog post, if you'd like to fill this out later, i can do that

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/1duo>@1duo</denchmark-link> Can we make sure this is fixed in coremltools-4.0
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ghop02>@ghop02</denchmark-link> , this issue should be fixed in the latest beta release. Feel free to re-open if you still see errors. Thanks!
